content: hey friend I have some great news for
you okay you might be wondering Scottie what is this on your shirt right why
isn't at the DM scrap well that's the news I've put my head together with a
dmg info Gareth of the dmg info and we are creating a new channel right so cool
and what we're doing is we're calling it quest givers okay and we're gonna be
creating modules alright and we're gonna have a module a new module every month
we've got a 12 month campaign laid out super cool super awesome we're really
we're really enjoying it and we're writing the modules you're gonna have
access to them you'll be able to pick them up and to help support the channel
but yeah the whole idea of this is we want your guys to support like these
modules aren't sacrosanct we want your guys's ideas and support we want monster
stats and ideas and we're gonna put those out in the community in our
communities and we're gonna you know put them in our emails and our mailing lists
and that kind of thing so it's all this stuff that you know you guys are helping
us create even better modules you know and a better gaming experience so our
videos are going to center around DM concepts GM concepts and also talking
about the modules so it's not just some you know it you know we reference things
it's not just a nebulous idea it's there's actually concrete things in the
module that we can reference in the videos which is really nice so I hope
you guys enjoyed this new channel I can't wait for you to come and check it
out check out all the links below join the Facebook group join the youtube
join all these other things we got going I get on the mailing list go to our
website check out all the links below this video and go to all of them because
you're gonna want to know when this stuff comes out and we're hitting
November 2nd so that's when the channel goes live right so I want to see you
guys there I want you guys to be informed of all this stuff and thank you
so much and I hope you enjoy the quest givers and being part of this community
and I can't wait to bring you these awesome modules
